# Request for Standing Offer for Building Condition Report Services
================================加入essment Brief

## Background
The Government of Canada has released a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Building Condition Report (BCR) services in support of various departmental projects in British Columbia and Yukon. The Standing Offers will be used to provide professional engineering services, including architectural and structural engineering, for building condition assessments.

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS444-1334334-Doc446-7734251
* Publication Date: 2024-03-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-22 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 2

## Required Services
Selected consultants shall provide the following services as part of their Standing Offer:
* Building Condition Report (BCR) services for building projects in British Columbia and Yukon.
* Architectural and structural engineering services to support building assessments.

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection decision will be based on the following evaluation criteria:
* Technical Merit (40%)
* Price (60%)

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18949735?extsite=MTg5NDk3MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information:

## Note
This Request for Standing Offer cancels and supersedes previous request WS4441334334 - Doc4441376725 dated February 16, 2024. Respondents are invited to submit their proposals for Standing Offers. The selected consultants shall provide services to the Government of Canada as identified in the Required Services section.
